      • globalLoader

        public ClassLoader globalLoader()
        Gets distributed class loader. Note that p2pContext(UUID, IgniteUuid, String, DeploymentMode, Map) must be called from the same thread prior to using this class loader, or the loading may happen for the wrong node or context.
        Returns:
        Cache class loader.

public IgniteUuid getClassLoaderId(@Nullable

        Parameters:
